SafeTogether is an app to help bring people together, no matter who you are! Nobody in this world is alone and no one should be, so help each other out!

Chat now!

Join a chat group!

About Us

What is our Mission?

SafeTogether is on a mission to have a safe, online community for young adults to talk about discrimination and to share their own experiences. This community was created by Noel(14), Skylar(13), Saniyyah(13), and Isabella(13). They made a website about discrimination because it is a relevant issue in today's world.
